mapper.insert: insert into address (id, parent_id, address_code, address_name, is_deleted, create_user_id, create_time, last_update_user_id, last_update_time, server_ip, version_no) values (#{id}, #{parentId}, #{addressCode}, #{addressName}, 0, #{createUserId}, #{createTime}, #{lastUpdateUserId}, #{lastUpdateTime}, #{serverIp}, #{versionNo})
